org.wonderly.jini2
Interface HttpServerAccess

All Superinterfaces:
Administrable, Remote, RemoteAdministrable
All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpServerService
public interface HttpServerAccess
extends RemoteAdministrable

This interface defines access to a codebase server which allows a service to get the httpmd: URL information for accessing a particular jar file.

Method Summary
 boolean canServe(String path, String type, String digest)
          If you know the sum and the path, you can ask the server if it can serve that version of the indicated path
 String sumFor(String path, String type)
          If you just know the path, you can ask the server for the sum of the version that it has.

Method Detail

canServe

boolean canServe(String path,
                 String type,
                 String digest)
                 throws IOException
If you know the sum and the path, you can ask the server if it can serve that version of the indicated path

Parameters:
path - URL path.
type - the type of digest
digest - the digest that we think the file should have
Throws:
IOException

sumFor

String sumFor(String path,
              String type)
              throws IOException
If you just know the path, you can ask the server for the sum of the version that it has.

Parameters:
path - URL path.
type - the type of sum desired as in "md5"
Throws:
IOException
